title: Billionaire investor Mark Cuban loses $870K in crypto in MetaMask wallet hack
description:
Entrepreneur and investor Mark Cuban, whose net worth is over $5 billion, fell victim to a hack on the night of Sept. 15. Cuban lost crypto assets worth $870,000 in the attack that compromised his MetaMask wallet, according to a DL News report. On-chain sleuth Wazz first pointed out the sudden transactions in the MetaMask […]

The post Billionaire investor Mark Cuban loses $870K in crypto in MetaMask wallet hack appeared first on CryptoSlate.

title: Jaguars quarterback Trevor Lawrence reaches resolution in FTX endorsement lawsuit
description: Jacksonville Jaguars star QB Trevor Lawrence is among the list of famous names who promoted FTX and is currently facing charges.

title: Ethereum Unveils “Holesky”: A Mega Test Network After the Landmark “Merge” Anniversary
description: Ethereum introduces Holesky, a test network twice the size of its main chain, enhancing its smart-contracts testing prowess. This launch commemorates the first year since Ethereum’s groundbreaking shift from “proof-of-work” to the more eco-friendly “proof-of-stake.” The Future of Testing on Ethereum Exactly a year after Ethereum’s revolutionary “Merge” – the transition from the energy-intensive “proof-of-work” [...]

title: FTX 2.0 Is on the Horizon – What does a reboot of the crypto exchange mean for FTT, SOL, and BTCS?
description: FTX is one exchange that has been making waves in the crypto space due to its commitment to pushing the boundaries of what a crypto exchange can be. title: Polygon (MATIC) Drops Major Teaser: What’s the Impact on Market? Best Time to Buy Domini.art Presale ($DOMI)?

title: Ex Huobi Employee Leaks Users’ Private Keys via Trojan Virus: Report
description:
Recent security breach on iToken exposes customers’ private keys. Law enforcement launched an investigation into the perpetrator, who is an ex-Huobi staff. The assets of affected users successfully transferred to a secure wallet. In an exclusive report, Colin Wu, a prominent Chinese reporter, revealed a significant security breach in the iToken platform, formerly known as […]
